title: How do I reduce my mobile data usage?
answer:
l Turn off the data service when you do not need it. 

l Turn off the data service if your phone is connected to a Wi-Fi network.

l Access Wireless Access Protocol (WAP) sites instead of World Wide Web (WWW) websites.

l [Turn off data synchronization in the background: Go to Settings and touch Accounts & sync. Turn off the synchronization.]()
